metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25623 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Erlang/OTP 22.3.x before 22.3.4.6 and 23.x before 23.1 allows Directory Traversal. An attacker can send a crafted HTTP request to read arbitrary files, if httpd in the inets application is used.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per upstream, introduced in OTP 22.3.1 and corrected in OTP 22.3.4.6. It was also introduced in OTP 23.0 and corrected in OTP 23.1

criterions.comment: erlang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
